concept.title: Kinesis Producer
concept.shortdesc: The Kinesis Producer destination writes data to an Amazon Kinesis cluster. You can write JSON objects or SDC Record data to Kinesis. Kinesis Producer writes JSON data to Kinesis as multiple objects. It does not write JSON arrays.

conbody.p: Kinesis Producer destinationoverviewdestinationsKinesis ProducerWhen you configure Kinesis Producer, you specify the Amazon Web Services connection information for your Kinesis cluster and the data format to use.

Kinesis Producer writes data using the following Kinesis requirements:
Writes a maximum of 500 messages and 4.5 MB in a batch.
Allows a maximum of 50 kb/message - Larger messages are sent to the stage for error handling.
Kinesis Producer writes data to the Kinesis cluster using a round-robin partition strategy.
